11-04.quote: The bismillah, or its shortened form, In the Name of God, is employed by pious Muslims to consecrate all licit actions, since from a Quranic perspective all things should be performed for the sake of God and in His Name.
11-04.author: The Study Quran

12-04.quote: They ask thee what they should spend. Say, â€œLet whatever of your wealth you spend be for parents, kinsfolk, orphans, the indigent, and the traveler. Whatever good you do, truly God knows it.
12-04.author: The Study Quran

13-04.quote: An honorable word and forgiveness are better than an act of charity followed by injury.
13-04.author: The Study Quran
